BACKUP_DESC: Data will be saved as volumio_data.tar.gz on root of SD CARD: you may copy it to other SD in same location. WARNING: New backup will erase previous
RESTORE_DESC: Will use volumio_data.tar.gz file from root of SD CARD to restore settings: make sure file is present !
QUEUE_DOC: Select if you want to backup current play queue
PLAYLIST_DOC: Select if you want to backup playlists
FAVOURITES_DOC: Select if you want to backup Favourites (includes my Web Radios, etc...)
CONFIGURATION_DOC: Select if you want to backup all settings. This will also save plugins settings. On restore on a new image, actual plugins will need to be re-installed, but their settings will be the kept
ALBUMART_DOC: Select if you want to backup Album Arts
